Provides the base classes and interfaces that represent a skeleton of that part of the JavaSVN low-level API that is used for i/o operations. The JavaSVN high-level API is certainly based on the low-level one where the main part is this package. All the details of an implementation of this basis are left behind the interface since a user is more interested in the interface itself.

SVNRepository is the central class in this package that provides the basic inerface to carry out the commands followed by data interchanging between a client and an SVN server.
For users familiar with the native Subversion source code it may be useful to know that the considerable part of the package classes functionality is more or less similar to the include/svn_ra.h declaration file.
